titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of artificial foliage.
A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of artificial foliage.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of, and refund of any duties and interest paid on, certain entries of artificial foliage.
